00320     class _OgreExport BorderRenderable : public Renderable, public OverlayAlloc
00321     {
00322     protected:
00323         BorderPanelOverlayElement* mParent;
00324     public:
00326         BorderRenderable(BorderPanelOverlayElement* parent) : mParent(parent)
00327         {
00328             mUseIdentityProjection = true;
00329             mUseIdentityView = true;
00330         }
00331         const MaterialPtr& getMaterial(void) const { return mParent->mpBorderMaterial; }
00332         void getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op) { op = mParent->mRenderOp2; }
00333         void getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const { mParent->getWorldTransforms(xform); }
00334         unsigned short getNumWorldTransforms(void) const { return 1; }
00335         Real getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera* cam) const { return mParent->getSquaredViewDepth(cam); }
00336         const LightList& getLights(void) const
00337         {
00338             // N/A, panels are not lit
00339             static LightList ll;
00340             return ll;
00341         }
00342         bool getPolygonModeOverrideable(void) const
00343         {
00344             return mParent->getPolygonModeOverrideable();
00345         }
00346     };
